apropos.title: About
apropos.paragraph:
Hello, my name is Alberto Giordani.
Former teacher and writer, I retrained as a front-end developer driven by a passion for logic, aesthetics and rigorous code.

I work with HTML, Sass, JavaScript and React, focusing on accessibility, performance and responsive design.

This portfolio is a technical showcase but also a reflection of my journey and aspirations.
